hero.title: 24EXC
hero.subtitle: 24/7 Global Digital Asset Exchange
hero.description: Secure · Fast · Compliant — Seamless exchange between stablecoins and fiat currencies, anytime and anywhere.

features.mainCoinsDesc: Exchange BTC, ETH, and USDT directly into major fiat currencies including USD, EUR, and SGD.
features.fastDepositDesc: Funds credited within minutes — minimizing idle capital and wait times.
features.globalCoverageDesc: Access multi-currency payment rails across Brazil, Southeast Asia, Europe, and more markets worldwide.
features.available24Desc: Round-the-clock exchange with no time‑zone delays for global users.

steps.stepOneDesc: Submit your exchange request (asset type and amount) via online chat, Telegram, or WhatsApp.
steps.stepTwoDesc: Transfer the cryptocurrency to the designated wallet address. Once confirmed on-chain, fiat settlement is processed promptly.
steps.stepThreeDesc: Exchange completed — track status in real time with full transparency at every step.
steps.description: 24EXC provides secure, transparent, and compliant exchange services for individuals and businesses. Settle quickly between major cryptocurrencies, stablecoins, and fiat currencies — available 24/7 worldwide. No account registration required: contact us, confirm your rate, complete payment and receipt, and finish the transaction within minutes.

testimonials.title: User Testimonials
testimonials.user1Content: For corporate transactions, compliance and reliability are essential. 24EXC delivers full KYC/AML verification, segregated client funds, real-time risk monitoring, and dedicated managers for large-volume orders. The corporate API and batch integration streamline deposits, withdrawals, and reconciliation across time zones.
testimonials.user1Highlight: KYC/AML, segregated funds, real-time risk controls, and dedicated large‑order support.
testimonials.user2Content: As an individual investor, I value security and ease of use. The interface is clean and intuitive, settlement is fast, and support is responsive and professional.
testimonials.user3Content: Truly global exchange services with transparent rates and no hidden fees. Cross-border transfers are faster and lower cost than traditional banks — great for international business.

partners.title: Partners
partners.description: We maintain long-term collaborations with banks, liquidity providers, custodians, and compliance institutions to support payment settlement, market liquidity, KYC/AML, and legal compliance — enabling secure 24/7 global exchange capabilities.

faq.title: FAQ
faq.question1: Which cryptocurrencies and fiat currencies are supported?
faq.answer1: We currently support major cryptocurrencies such as BTC, ETH, and USDT, as well as multiple fiat currencies including USD, EUR, SGD, BRL, and INR. Our global coverage continues to expand to offer convenient exchange services worldwide.
faq.answer2: We adopt bank-grade security standards, including multi-signature wallets, cold/hot wallet separation, SSL-encrypted transmission, and real-time risk monitoring. All transactions follow international KYC/AML requirements and are processed through licensed financial partners. The platform monitors anomalies 24/7 to safeguard every order.
faq.answer3: Yes. To ensure transaction security and comply with international AML rules, users complete KYC verification. Small transactions require basic information, while larger ones require additional documentation. The process is quick and typically completed within 5–10 minutes; all information is encrypted and securely stored.
faq.answer4: We use a transparent tiered fee structure of 0.5%–2%, depending on transaction amount and asset type. Larger transactions receive more favorable rates, and corporate clients can request customized pricing. All fees are shown clearly before confirmation — no hidden charges.

Loading.tagline: Preparing the best crypto-fiat exchange experience...

ProductPage.title: Products & Services
ProductPage.subtitle: Products & Services
ProductPage.tagline: Multi-Currency Exchange · Cross-Border Settlement · Secure & Efficient
ProductPage.personalWithdrawalDesc: Quickly convert digital assets to fiat and transfer to bank accounts or supported payment methods. Available 24/7 for BTC, ETH, USDT, and more. Instant settlement reduces idle capital. KYC and risk controls ensure a secure and compliant experience for freelancers, investors, and everyday users.
ProductPage.crossBorderSettlementDesc: Meet international payment needs for enterprises, cross-border e-commerce, and individuals. Achieve fast multi-currency settlement without the high fees and long waits of traditional remittances. Built on blockchain settlement infrastructure for transparent, auditable transactions and reduced counterparty risk — from tuition and living expenses to large corporate payouts.
ProductPage.fiatDepositDesc: Deposit USD, SGD, EUR, and other fiat currencies as an easy on-ramp to digital assets. Supports bank transfers and approved third-party payments with a simple flow and rapid crediting. Identity verification and source-of-funds checks ensure compliance and build user trust.

ProcessPage.title: How It Works
ProcessPage.subtitle: How It Works
ProcessPage.contactSupportDesc: Submit your exchange request (asset type and amount) via online chat, Telegram, or WhatsApp.
ProcessPage.paymentReceiptDesc: Transfer the cryptocurrency to the designated wallet address. After on-chain confirmation, we process fiat settlement promptly.
ProcessPage.transactionCompleteDesc: Exchange successful. Track progress in real time with full transparency throughout the process.
ProcessPage.faq1Question: Who can I send Singapore Dollars (SGD) to?
ProcessPage.faq1Answer: You can send SGD to any individual or business with a Singapore bank account. We support transfers to major banks including DBS, OCBC, and UOB. Provide the recipient’s bank details and we will complete the SGD transfer after confirming your crypto deposit.
ProcessPage.faq2Answer: Security is our top priority. We use cold/hot wallet separation, multi-signature controls, real-time risk monitoring, and strict KYC/AML procedures. All transactions are transmitted over encrypted channels, and client assets are held in segregated accounts with qualified custodians.
ProcessPage.faq3Answer: Yes. To comply with AML/KYC regulations and protect users, we verify identities. Small transactions may require basic information, while larger ones require official ID documents. The process is straightforward and typically completed within minutes.
ProcessPage.faq4Answer: Fees vary by transaction size and currency and remain fully transparent. Typical fees range from 0.5%–2%, with exact pricing shown before you confirm the transaction. Larger transactions may receive preferential rates. No hidden fees.

SecurityPage.title: Security & Compliance
SecurityPage.subtitle: Security & Compliance
SecurityPage.securityMeasuresDesc: Multi-signature protection, cold wallet custody, and real-time risk monitoring
SecurityPage.complianceStatementDesc: Fully compliant with international KYC/AML standards; services are unavailable in sanctioned or restricted jurisdictions
SecurityPage.protectionMechanismDesc: Segregated client funds, dedicated handling for high-value transactions, and compensation safeguards
SecurityPage.detailDescription: Security and compliance are the cornerstones of user trust. 24EXC employs a layered security architecture — including multi-signature mechanisms and cold wallet storage — to mitigate single-point risks and protect against attacks. Real-time risk controls and data-driven monitoring rapidly identify and block anomalous transactions. On the compliance side, the platform follows international KYC (identity verification) and AML (anti–money laundering) standards, conducting comprehensive checks on user identities and sources of funds, and refrains from serving sanctioned jurisdictions. Client assets are strictly segregated from company operational funds, with dedicated handling and contingency plans for large-value transfers to minimize risk exposure and provide a transparent, trustworthy environment.

SecuritySection.title: Security & Compliance

item2.title: Regulatory Filing & Legal Guarantee
item2.hoverContent: XAUC completes compliance filing according to applicable jurisdiction requirements, with all processes operating under formal legal frameworks. Minting, custody, and redemption mechanisms are constrained by clear regulatory requirements, ensuring transparent and traceable asset sources and flows. Provides users with a stable, credible, and traceable legal guarantee foundation.

item3.title: On-chain Transparency & Audit Interface
item3.hoverContent: XAUC's reserve and circulation data can all be verified on-chain and are publicly disclosed in real-time through the Proof Dashboard. Independent third parties regularly provide reserve audits, ensuring a 1:1 correspondence between gold reserves and token issuance. Open query interfaces and data sources enable individuals and institutions to independently verify XAUC's real status.

SecuritySection.description:
XAUC's physical gold reserves are distributed and custodied by multiple regulated vaults, establishing redundancy mechanisms at both geographical and institutional levels.
This architecture ensures that even if a single custodian or region experiences risk, the overall reserves remain safe and controllable.

phase3.title: Expansion Phase
phase3.description:
Achieve multi-chain support and
Global compliance license layout

AboutPage.title: About Us
AboutPage.subtitle: About Us
AboutPage.visionDesc: 24EXC is committed to moving beyond traditional currency exchange by delivering a secure, compliant, and global next‑generation crypto-fiat platform. We believe digital assets should be as seamless and reliable as everyday payments, enabling individuals and businesses to move funds worldwide with confidence. Our ambition is to be more than a facilitator — to become trusted financial infrastructure for our users.

GlobalPage.title: Global Coverage
GlobalPage.subtitle: Global Reach
GlobalPage.intro: By building a global service network, 24EXC not only enables 24/7 cross-border exchange but also provides a unified entry point for individual and enterprise users — a one‑stop platform for global payment and settlement with true scale and international competitiveness.
GlobalPage.brazilDesc: Supports BRL deposits and settlements, meeting the needs of cross-border e-commerce and freelancers.
GlobalPage.europeDesc: Aligned with EU KYC/AML requirements; supports EUR settlements for compliant and secure transfers.
GlobalPage.southeastAsiaDesc: Low-cost, fast-arrival services tailored to mobile-first payment environments — empowering global expansion.
GlobalPage.indiaDesc: Fast INR exchange for high-frequency scenarios such as overseas remittances and education payments.

newsList.title: 24EXC Officially Launches BTC & ETH Fiat Exchange — Enabling 24/7 Global Conversion
newsList.description: 24EXC now offers live exchange for BTC, ETH, and multiple fiat currencies (USD, EUR, BRL, INR), delivering a secure, compliant, near‑instant experience for users worldwide.
newsList.content:
24EXC removes time and geographic constraints with uninterrupted 24/7 service. The platform leverages multi‑signature cold wallet protection and a real‑time risk monitoring system to safeguard every transaction. Corporate users can also automate large‑volume settlement via APIs to improve efficiency and transparency.

“In the decentralized era, financial services should be as accessible as air,” a 24EXC product manager said. “BTC and ETH are core digital assets, and our goal is to help more users participate with lower friction and higher efficiency.”

24EXC will continue adding support for more mainstream assets and emerging‑market fiat currencies to build a truly global crypto‑fiat network.

newsList.title: From Crypto to the Real World: Bridging BTC/ETH to Global Fiat
newsList.description: As a next‑generation crypto‑fiat platform, 24EXC provides live rates and settlement within minutes. Users can exchange anytime on web or mobile, with built‑in KYC/AML checks for compliance and fund safety.
newsList.content:
Individuals and enterprises benefit alike. Cross‑border e‑commerce merchants, freelancers, and financial institutions can leverage 24EXC’s corporate APIs for batch settlement and treasury automation, accelerating global capital flows.

The launch underscores how crypto is integrating into mainstream payment ecosystems — becoming a crucial bridge between digital assets and the real economy.

newsList.title: Beginner’s Guide: Exchange BTC/ETH to Fiat in One Minute
newsList.description: Secure · Compliant · Global Coverage — 24EXC makes digital asset conversion effortless.
newsList.content:
New to crypto? Converting Bitcoin or Ethereum to fiat is simple with a few steps:

1. Complete KYC verification — a key step for safety and fraud prevention.

2. Choose the asset (BTC/ETH/USDT) and the target fiat (USD/SGD/EUR, etc.).

3. Submit your request and receive funds — average settlement completes within minutes with full fund security.

24EXC provides 24/7 online support to help first‑time users choose the best path to secure, compliant withdrawals.
